name: AsposeCellsCloud
description: Aspose.Cells for Cloud is a REST API that helps you create, manipulate and convert spreadsheets in the cloud. It allows you to work with all aspects of spreadsheets: worksheets, rows, columns, cells, text, data, images, links, comments, formulas, charts, and many more. Use Aspose.Cells for Cloud to create spreadsheets from scratch, manipulate spreadsheets, and convert spreadsheets to other formats. Render a spreadsheet to image formats such as JPEG, PNG, SVG, GIF and TIFF, or render charts and other objects to images. Aspose.Cells for Cloud allows you to convert a spreadsheet to different formats like PDF, XPS, TIFF and others. Use it to work with individual cells in a spreadsheet, or to add comments, hyperlinks and pictures to cells, or to apply validation rules. Aspose.Cells for Cloud also makes working with rows, columns and cells easy.
